ciscoLwappWapiMIB.name: ciscoLwappWapiMIB

revisions.description: cisco WiFi Controller Snmp agent support for Wapi. WAPI is a Chinese National Standard for Wireless LAN (GB 15629.11-2003)

ciscoLwappWapiMIB.contactinfo: Cisco Systems Customer Service Postal: 170 West Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETS Email : cs-wnbu-snmp@cisco.com
ciscoLwappWapiMIB.description: cisco WiFi Controller Snmp agent support for Wapi. WAPI is a Chinese National Standard for Wireless LAN (GB 15629.11-2003) GLOSSARY: WAPI - WLAN Authentication and Privacy Infrastructures WAI - WLAN Authentication Interface WLAN - Wireless Local Area Network WPI - Wireless Privacy Interface MSK - multicast session key AKM - authentication and key management BKID - Base Key IDentification

cLWapiWlanStats.name: cLWapiWlanStats
cLWapiWlanStats.description: This table maintains the WAPI statistics for each WLAN on which WAPI is configured as the security protocol.

cLWapiWlanStatsEntry.name: cLWapiWlanStatsEntry
cLWapiWlanStatsEntry.description: An entry in the cLWWSW Table

cLWWSWAISignatureErrors.name: cLWWSWAISignatureErrors
cLWWSWAISignatureErrors.description: This counter shall increment when the signature in the received WAI message is incorrect

cLWWSWAIHMACErrors.name: cLWWSWAIHMACErrors
cLWWSWAIHMACErrors.description: This counter shall increment when the message authentication code in the received WAI message is incorrect

cLWWSWAIAuthResultFailures.name: cLWWSWAIAuthResultFailures
cLWWSWAIAuthResultFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI authentication is unsuccessful

cLWWSWAIDiscardCounters.name: cLWWSWAIDiscardCounters
cLWWSWAIDiscardCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the received WAI message is discarded

cLWWSWAITimeoutCounters.name: cLWWSWAITimeoutCounters
cLWWSWAITimeoutCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI message is timeout

cLWWSWAIFormatErrors.name: cLWWSWAIFormatErrors
cLWWSWAIFormatErrors.description: This counter shall increment when there exists format error in the WAI message

cLWWSWAICertHandshakeFailures.name: cLWWSWAICertHandshakeFailures
cLWWSWAICertHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Certificate Authentication is unsuccessful

cLWWSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures.name: cLWWSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures
cLWWSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Unicast Key Negotiation is unsuccessful

cLWWSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures.name: cLWWSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures
cLWWSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Multicast Key Negotiation is unsuccessful

cLWWSWPIRXReplayCounters.name: cLWWSWPIRXReplayCounters
cLWWSWPIRXReplayCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the WPI RX replay check is unsuccessful

cLWWSWPIRXMicErrorCounters.name: cLWWSWPIRXMicErrorCounters
cLWWSWPIRXMicErrorCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the WPI MIC is error

cLWWSWPIRXDecryptErrorCounters.name: cLWWSWPIRXDecryptErrorCounters
cLWWSWPIRXDecryptErrorCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the WPI Decryption is error

cLWapiClientStats.name: cLWapiClientStats
cLWapiClientStats.description: This table maintains the WAPI statistics for each client connected to a WLAN on which WAPI is configured as the security protocol.

cLWapiClientStatsEntry.name: cLWapiClientStatsEntry
cLWapiClientStatsEntry.description: An entry in the cLWapiClientStats Table

cLWCSWapiClientVersion.name: cLWCSWapiClientVersion
cLWCSWapiClientVersion.description: This object represents the WAPI draft version used by the WAPI client

cLWCSWAISignatureErrors.name: cLWCSWAISignatureErrors
cLWCSWAISignatureErrors.description: This counter shall increment when the signature in the received WAI message is incorrect

cLWCSWAIHMACErrors.name: cLWCSWAIHMACErrors
cLWCSWAIHMACErrors.description: This counter shall increment when the message authentication code in the received WAI message is incorrect

cLWCSWAIAuthResultFailures.name: cLWCSWAIAuthResultFailures
cLWCSWAIAuthResultFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI authentication is unsuccessful

cLWCSWAIDiscardCounters.name: cLWCSWAIDiscardCounters
cLWCSWAIDiscardCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the received WAI message is discarded

cLWCSWAITimeoutCounters.name: cLWCSWAITimeoutCounters
cLWCSWAITimeoutCounters.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI message is timeout

cLWCSWAIFormatErrors.name: cLWCSWAIFormatErrors
cLWCSWAIFormatErrors.description: This counter shall increment when there exists format error in the WAI message

cLWCSWAICertHandshakeFailures.name: cLWCSWAICertHandshakeFailures
cLWCSWAICertHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Certificate Authentication is unsuccessful

cLWCSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures.name: cLWCSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures
cLWCSWAIUnicastHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Unicast Key Negotiation is unsuccessful

cLWCSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures.name: cLWCSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures
cLWCSWAIMulticastHandshakeFailures.description: This counter shall increment when the WAI Multicast Key Negotiation is unsuccessful

cLWCSWAIUnicastCipherSuite.name: cLWCSWAIUnicastCipherSuite
cLWCSWAIUnicastCipherSuite.description: This value represents the Client Unicast Cipher Suite in use, of which obtained from Assoc req frame

cLWCSWAIMcastCipherSuite.name: cLWCSWAIMcastCipherSuite
cLWCSWAIMcastCipherSuite.description: This value represents the Client Multicast Cipher Suite in use, of which obtained from Assoc req frame

cLWCSWAIAuthenticationSuiteRequested.name: cLWCSWAIAuthenticationSuiteRequested
cLWCSWAIAuthenticationSuiteRequested.description: This object specificies the last AKM suite requested from client. 0x 00 14 72 01 : cert 0x 00 14 72 02 : psk

cLWCSWAIBKIDUsed.name: cLWCSWAIBKIDUsed
cLWCSWAIBKIDUsed.description: This value represents the selector of the last BKID used in the last Unicast Key Negotiation Handshake

cLWCSWAICtrPortState.name: cLWCSWAICtrPortState
cLWCSWAICtrPortState.description: This value represents the state of client controlled port entity, true means authenticated, false means not authenticated

cLWapiWlanConfig.name: cLWapiWlanConfig
cLWapiWlanConfig.description: This table maintains the WAPI config entry for the WLAN.

cLWapiWlanConfigEntrty.name: cLWapiWlanConfigEntrty
cLWapiWlanConfigEntrty.description: An entry in the cLWapiWlanConfig Table

cLWCSWlanWapiEnable.name: cLWCSWlanWapiEnable
cLWCSWlanWapiEnable.description: This object is used to enable the WAPI security on the WLAN.

cLWCSWlanWapiAkmKeyMgmtMode.name: cLWCSWlanWapiAkmKeyMgmtMode
cLWCSWlanWapiAkmKeyMgmtMode.description: This object is used to enable the AKM type to be used for the WAPI WLAN.

cLWCSWlanWapiEncryptType.name: cLWCSWlanWapiEncryptType
cLWCSWlanWapiEncryptType.description: This object is used to enable the encryption type for WAPI WLAN.

cLWCSWlanWapiPskFmt.name: cLWCSWlanWapiPskFmt
cLWCSWlanWapiPskFmt.description: This object indicates the type of the authentication preshared key configured through the object cLWCSWlanWapiPskSetkey. Note that the key configuration is applicable only when psk is configured as the key management mechanism through the cLWCSWlanWapiAkmKeyMgmtMode object.

cLWCSWlanWapiPsk.name: cLWCSWlanWapiPsk
cLWCSWlanWapiPsk.description: This object is used to configure the Pre-Shared Key for WAI PSK authentication for the WLAN. The key can be in ASCII or HEX format. 'ascii' 8-40 characters 'hex' 4-40 octets.

cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicasCiphersEntry.name: cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicasCiphersEntry
cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicasCiphersEntry.description: The selector of a supported unicast cipher suite. It consists of an OUI (the first 3 octets) and a cipher suite identifier (the last octet).

cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicastCipherSize.name: cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicastCipherSize
cLWCSWlanWapiConfigUnicastCipherSize.description: This object indicates the length in bit of the USK. This should be 256 for SMS4. The first 128bits is the UEK and the last 128bits is the UCK.

cLWCSWlanWapiMcastCipherSize.name: cLWCSWlanWapiMcastCipherSize
cLWCSWlanWapiMcastCipherSize.description: This object indicates the length in bit of the MSK. This should be 256 for in SMS4. The first 128bits is the MEK and the last 128bits is the MCK.

cLWCSWlanBKLifeTime.name: cLWCSWlanBKLifeTime
cLWCSWlanBKLifeTime.description: This object is used to configure the maximum lifetime of a BK in the BK cache.

cLWCSWlanBKReauthThreshold.name: cLWCSWlanBKReauthThreshold
cLWCSWlanBKReauthThreshold.description: This object is used to configure the percentage of the BK lifetime that should expire before a WAI reauthentication occurs.

cLWCSWlanWapiConfigMulticastCipher.name: cLWCSWlanWapiConfigMulticastCipher
cLWCSWlanWapiConfigMulticastCipher.description: This object indicates the multicast cipher suite that this entity must adopt. The WAPI Parameter Set information element shall adopt the value of this variable, which contains a 3-octet OUI and a one-octet cipher suite identifier.

cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteSelected.name: cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteSelected
cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteSelected.description: This object represents the selector of the last AKM suite negotiated.

cLWCSWlanWapiUnicastCipherSelected.name: cLWCSWlanWapiUnicastCipherSelected
cLWCSWlanWapiUnicastCipherSelected.description: This object indicates the selector of the last unicast cipher suite negotiated.

cLWCSWlanWapiMulticastCipherSelected.name: cLWCSWlanWapiMulticastCipherSelected
cLWCSWlanWapiMulticastCipherSelected.description: This object indicates the selector of the last multicast cipher suite negotiated.

cLWCSWlanWapiPreauthenticationState.name: cLWCSWlanWapiPreauthenticationState
cLWCSWlanWapiPreauthenticationState.description: This object represents the state of Preauthentication in WAPI and currently it is not supported.

cLWapiAPTable.name: cLWapiAPTable
cLWapiAPTable.description: This table maintains the WAPI details and configurations for each AP connected.

cLWapiAPEntry.name: cLWapiAPEntry
cLWapiAPEntry.description: An entry in the cLWapiAPTable Table.

cLWCSWapiAPMaxUnicastKeysSupport.name: cLWCSWapiAPMaxUnicastKeysSupport
cLWCSWapiAPMaxUnicastKeysSupport.description: This object represents the maximum number of USK's that an AP can support.

cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigTable.name: cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigTable
cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigTable.description: This table maintains the WAPI config entry for the WLAN.

cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigEntry.name: cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigEntry
cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfigEntry.description: An entry in the cLWapiWlanAKMSuitesConfig Table

cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteIndex.name: cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteIndex
cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteIndex.description: This object is used to a index for AKM suites on the WLAN.

cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuite.name: cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuite
cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuite.description: This object is used to indicate the AKM suite octects on the WLAN.

cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteEnable.name: cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteEnable
cLWCSWlanWapiAuthenticationSuiteEnable.description: This object is used to enable the AKM suites on the WLAN.

cLWapiCiphers.name: cLWapiCiphers
cLWapiCiphers.description: This table maintains the unicast cipher suites supported by this entity. It allows enabling and disabling of each unicast cipher suite by network management. The unicast cipher suite list in the WAPI Parameter Set information element is formed using the information in this table.

cLWapiCiphersEntry.name: cLWapiCiphersEntry
cLWapiCiphersEntry.description: An entry in the cLWapiCiphers Table.

cLWCSWlanCipherIndex.name: cLWCSWlanCipherIndex
cLWCSWlanCipherIndex.description: This object represents auxiliary index of the CiscoWapiCiphersEntry.

cLWCSWlanCipherEnabled.name: cLWCSWlanCipherEnabled
cLWCSWlanCipherEnabled.description: This object represents enables or disables the unicast cipher.

clWapiASIpAddress.name: clWapiASIpAddress
clWapiASIpAddress.description: This object represents the IP address of the WAPI authentication server.

clWapiASPortNumber.name: clWapiASPortNumber
clWapiASPortNumber.description: This object represents the UDP port number for WAPI authentication server.

clWapiASRequestTimeout.name: clWapiASRequestTimeout
clWapiASRequestTimeout.description: This object represents timeout value for the packets sent to Auth Server.

clWapiMulticastRekeyMethod.name: clWapiMulticastRekeyMethod
clWapiMulticastRekeyMethod.description: This object selects a mechanism for rekeying the WAPI MSK. The default is time-based, once per day. Rekeying the MSK is only applicable to an entry acting in the AE role.

clWapiMulticastRekeyTime.name: clWapiMulticastRekeyTime
clWapiMulticastRekeyTime.description: This object represents the time in seconds after which the WAPI MSK will be refreshed. The timer will start the moment the MSK was set using the MLME-SETWPIKEYS request primitive.

clWapiMulticastRekeyMessages.name: clWapiMulticastRekeyMessages
clWapiMulticastRekeyMessages.description: This object represents the message count in thousands after which the WAPI MSK will be refreshed. The message counter will start the moment the MSK was set using the MLME-SETWPIKEYS request primitive.

clWapiMulticastRekeyStrict.name: clWapiMulticastRekeyStrict
clWapiMulticastRekeyStrict.description: This object signals that the MSK shall be refreshed whenever a STA leaves the BSS that possesses the MSK.

clWapiConfigCertificateUpdateCount.name: clWapiConfigCertificateUpdateCount
clWapiConfigCertificateUpdateCount.description: This object represents the number of times messages in the WAPI hhandshake protocol will be retried per certificate handshake attempt.

clWapiConfigMulticastUpdateCount.name: clWapiConfigMulticastUpdateCount
clWapiConfigMulticastUpdateCount.description: This object represents the number of times message 1 in the WAPI muticast key announcement handshake will be retried per MSK handshake attempt.

clWapiConfigUnicastUpdateCount.name: clWapiConfigUnicastUpdateCount
clWapiConfigUnicastUpdateCount.description: This object represents the number of times message 1 and message 3 in the WAPI unicast key announcement handshake will be retried per USK handshake attempt.

cLWCSWapiConfigureVersion.name: cLWCSWapiConfigureVersion
cLWCSWapiConfigureVersion.description: This object represents the WAPI configuration version

clWapiConfigControlledPortControl.name: clWapiConfigControlledPortControl
clWapiConfigControlledPortControl.description: This object indicates the value of the Controlled port. If the value is 0 which means automatic, the current behaviour. The state of the controlled port shall be based on the result of authentication.

clWapiUserInvalidCertificationInbreakNet.name: clWapiUserInvalidCertificationInbreakNetwork
clWapiUserInvalidCertificationInbreakNet.description: This object represents the WAPI user with invalid certification.

cLApWAPISecurityLowAttack.name: cLApWAPISecurityLowAttack
cLApWAPISecurityLowAttack.description: This object represents the WAPI security low attack notification information.

clWapiUnicastRekeyMethod.name: clWapiUnicastRekeyMethod
clWapiUnicastRekeyMethod.description: This object selects a mechanism for rekeying the WAPI USK. The default is time-based, once per day. Rekeying the USK is only applicable to an entry acting in the AE role. Method 1 (disabled) will temporarily stop the unicast rekeying

clWapiUnicastRekeyTime.name: clWapiUnicastRekeyTime
clWapiUnicastRekeyTime.description: This object represents the time in seconds after which the WAPI USK will be refreshed. The timer will start the moment the USK was set using the MLME-SETWPIKEYS request primitive.

clWapiUnicastRekeyMessage.name: clWapiUnicastRekeyMessage
clWapiUnicastRekeyMessage.description: This object represents the message count in thousands after which the WAPI USK will be refreshed. The message counter will start the moment the USK was set using the MLME-SETWPIKEYS request primitive. This MIB will be configurable od of TIME or TIME&PACKET

clWapiConfigSATimeout.name: clWapiConfigSATimeout
clWapiConfigSATimeout.description: This object represents the maximum time a security association shall take to set up.

cLApWAPIReplayAttack.name: cLApWAPIReplayAttack
cLApWAPIReplayAttack.description: This object represents the WAPI replay attack notification information.

cLApWAPITamperAttack.name: cLApWAPITamperAttack
cLApWAPITamperAttack.description: This object represents the WAPI tamper attack notification information.

clWapiAddressRedirectAttack.name: clWapiAddressRedirectAttack
clWapiAddressRedirectAttack.description: This object represents the WAPI redirect attack notification information.

clWapiWLCCertificateStatus.name: clWapiWLCCertificateStatus
clWapiWLCCertificateStatus.description: This object represents the installation state of WLC Certificate. True means the WLC certificate is installed. False means it is uninstalled.

clWapiCACertificateStatus.name: clWapiCACertificateStatus
clWapiCACertificateStatus.description: This object represents the installation state of Certificate Authority Certificate. True means the CA certificate is installed. False means it is uninstalled

clWapiASCertificateStatus.name: clWapiASCertificateStatus
clWapiASCertificateStatus.description: This object represents the installation state of Auth Server Certificate. True means the AS certificate is installed. False means it is uninstalled.

ciscoLwappWapiUserInvalidCertificateNetw.name: ciscoLwappWapiUserInvalidCertificateNetworkTrap
ciscoLwappWapiUserInvalidCertificateNetw.description: This notification will be sent when the WAPI Client is installed with invalid certificates.

ciscoLwappWapiSecurityLowAttackTrap.name: ciscoLwappWapiSecurityLowAttackTrap
ciscoLwappWapiSecurityLowAttackTrap.description: This notification will be sent when AP received a fake Unicast Key Negotiation Response frame of which the WIE_AUSE is different with that of AP sent before.

ciscoLwappWapiReplayAttackTrap.name: ciscoLwappWapiReplayAttackTrap
ciscoLwappWapiReplayAttackTrap.description: This notification will be sent when AP received an AE challenge is different with that of AP received before.

ciscoLwappWapiTamperAttackTrap.name: ciscoLwappWapiTamperAttackTrap
ciscoLwappWapiTamperAttackTrap.description: This notification will be sent when AP received an invaild Message Authentication Code.

ciscoLwappWapiAddressRedirectAttackTrap.name: ciscoLwappWapiAddressRedirectAttackTrap
ciscoLwappWapiAddressRedirectAttackTrap.description: This notification will be sent when AP received an address redirect attack trap. Radio interface information (MAC), BSSID, SSID, Mac of station
